name: The Guild Gold Edition
description: Script for the version form GOG
notes: last wineDB rated gold, HWTL executable has coulors of. Fix status unknown

files.goginstaller: N/A: Select the game's setup file

content:
files:
- goginstaller: 'N/A: Select the game''s setup file'
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Guild Gold/Europa1400Gold.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: goginstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
